long_description: Made from a sleek, water-repellent ripstop nylon, the REI RFID Bi-Fold Wallet combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside credit and debit cards. Multiple credit card slots; ID window; bill compartment. REI RFID Bi-Fold Wallet has both a snap closure and flexible rip-and-stick band to keep contents secure.
short_description: Made from a sleek, water-repellent ripstop nylon, the REI RFID Bi-Fold Wallet combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips.
